para: In this chapter we'll cover web server setup with the apache software.

According to NetCraft (https://news.netcraft.com/archives/category/web-server-survey) in 2005 ,about seventy one percent of all web servers were running on Apache web server. Today, 2023, the number is significantly lower, around twenty four percent, yet Apache web server is still significant tool to know. The name is derived from a patchy web server, because of all the patches people wrote for the NCSA httpd server.
Later chapters will expand this web server into a LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, Mysql, Perl/PHP/Python).
